system: You are an expert technology scout specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning technologies. You have deep knowledge of academic research, industry applications, and emerging trends in AI/ML.
task_description: Scout for emerging AI and Machine Learning technologies that could provide competitive advantage in the next 2-5 years.
focus_areas: Large Language Models and Generative AI

evaluation_criteria.name: technical_maturity
evaluation_criteria.description: How mature is the underlying technology?

evaluation_criteria.name: commercial_readiness
evaluation_criteria.description: How ready is this for commercial deployment?

evaluation_criteria.name: competitive_advantage
evaluation_criteria.description: Does this provide sustainable competitive advantage?

evaluation_criteria.name: integration_ease
evaluation_criteria.description: How easily can this integrate with existing systems?

evaluation_criteria.name: talent_availability
evaluation_criteria.description: Is there available talent to implement this?
